```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
```

```{r Question 1}
flights %>%
  filter(dest %in% c("ATL", "BOS"))%>%
  filter(arr_delay <= 30 & arr_delay >= -30)%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = origin, y = arr_delay)) + 
  geom_violin(aes(fill = origin),show.legend = FALSE)+
  coord_flip()+
  geom_boxplot(width = 0.2, fill = "grey")+
  facet_grid(rows = vars(dest))
```

```{r Question 2}
flights %>%
  filter(!is.na(dep_time))%>%
  filter(sched_dep_time > dep_time)%>%
  group_by(origin) %>%
  summarize(on_time = mean(sched_arr_time >= arr_time, na.rm = TRUE) *100)%>%
  arrange(on_time)%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = origin, y = on_time)) + 
  geom_col(aes(fill = origin), show.legend = FALSE)
```
